projects.title: Atlas - Competition Robot
projects.description: Our current competition robot for the ARC Championship season, featuring a 6-motor mecanum drivetrain and advanced autonomous capabilities.

projects.title: Titan - Skills Champion
projects.description: Our award-winning robot from 2024-2025 season, known for reliability and consistent autonomous performance.

projects.title: Autonomous Control Suite
projects.description: Custom PID controllers, odometry systems, and path planning algorithms developed in-house for competition.

projects.title: Vision Tracking System
projects.description: Real-time object detection and tracking using a vision sensor for ARC game element identification during autonomous.

projects.title: Phoenix - Worlds Qualifier
projects.description: Our first World Championship qualifying robot, featuring an X-drive holonomic drivetrain and field-centric controls.

projects.title: STEM Outreach Program
projects.description: Workshops and mentorship programs introducing local students to robotics and engineering fundamentals.
